AstroObjectEntry.Entry:
INSPIRED The Inspired Stowaway
INSP R1 Sunless Comet I found a frozen comet hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.
INSP R2 COMET_INTERIOR The Inspired 1 The Interloper was used as the model for this comet, named the Inspired.
`
INSP R3 The Inspired 1 The Inspired's lattice is incomplete, with entry points at the front of the structure.
`
INSP R4 The Inspired 1 All available gravity crystals from the Gravity Crystal Workshop were used to build something called the Inspired.
`
INSP R5 DEEP_STORM_STATION The Inspired's construction used a white-hole warp core from the Deep Storm Station's paired warp cores.
INSP R6 DEEP_STORM_STATION A black hole inside the comet warped me into some sort of underwater Nomai station flooded with ghost matter.
A black hole inside the comet warped me into the Deep Storm Station. DSS EX1
INSP EX1 A frozen comet hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.
An artificial comet hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep. DSS EX4
INSP EX2 I was able to enter the comet's interior. The structure's interior is comprised of large gravity crystals, all pointing towards a black hole at the center of the structure.
INSP EX3 A black hole inside the comet warped me into some sort of underwater Nomai station flooded with ghost matter.
A black hole inside the comet warped me into the Deep Storm Station. DSS EX1

RumorFact.Text: [Secret Achievement] Jump into a black hole while holding the white hole it is paired to.

ExploreFact.Text: [Secret Achievement] I jumped into the Inspired's black hole while holding the white-hole warp core it was paired to!
